main event: One round bright object was seen in the NW sky at about 10 degree elevation for approximately 1 minute.
interesting points: The object was visible without sound, trail, or change in shape or size., The sighting occurred at approximately 10 degrees elevation., The object appeared to stand still during the observation., The sighting was recorded as a potentially unidentified aircraft., The report suggests that the object's visibility corresponds with typical balloon launching times.
